>
<deleted>

Okay.  I really must not be grasping what you are saying about REST vs MoST.
It seems to me that MoST is just an additional layer above ReST, but you
appearently believe the two architectures are dissimilar.  When you get a
working model of this MoST approach up, I would certainly like to see more.
Until then, I think the REST approach provides good guidelines that have
significantly improved (and are continuing to improve) the design of my
applications.  If you can offer something better, I'm all ears.  But at this
point, I just don't see what you seem to see.

---
Seairth Jacobs
seairth@...
